00033 namespace cusp
00034 {
00035   // forward definitions
00036   template <typename RandomAccessIterator> class array1d_view;
00037 
00053 template <typename T, typename MemorySpace>
00054 class array1d : public thrust::detail::vector_base<T, typename cusp::default_memory_allocator<T, MemorySpace>::type>
00055 {
00056     private:
00057         typedef typename cusp::default_memory_allocator<T, MemorySpace>::type Alloc;
00058         typedef typename thrust::detail::vector_base<T,Alloc> Parent;
00059 
00060     public:
00061         typedef MemorySpace memory_space;
00062         typedef cusp::array1d_format format;
00063 
00066         typedef typename cusp::array1d<T,MemorySpace> container;
00067         
00070         typedef typename cusp::array1d_view<typename Parent::iterator> view;
00071         
00074         typedef typename cusp::array1d_view<typename Parent::const_iterator> const_view;
00075 
00076         typedef typename Parent::size_type  size_type;
00077         typedef typename Parent::value_type value_type;
00078 
00079         array1d(void) : Parent() {}
00080 
00081         explicit array1d(size_type n)
00082             : Parent()
00083         {
00084             if(n > 0)
00085             {
00086                 Parent::m_storage.allocate(n);
00087                 Parent::m_size = n;
00088             }
00089         }
00090         
00091         array1d(size_type n, const value_type &value) 
00092           : Parent(n, value) {}
00093 
00094         template<typename Array>
00095           array1d(const Array& a, typename thrust::detail::enable_if<!thrust::detail::is_convertible<Array,size_type>::value>::type * = 0)
00096           : Parent(a.begin(), a.end()) {}
00097 
00098         template<typename InputIterator>
00099           array1d(InputIterator first, InputIterator last)
00100           : Parent(first, last) {}
00101 
00102         template<typename Array>
00103           array1d &operator=(const Array& a)
00104           { Parent::assign(a.begin(), a.end()); return *this; }
00105 
00106         // TODO specialize resize()
00107 }; // class array1d
00122 template <typename RandomAccessIterator>
00123 class array1d_view
00124 {
00125   public:
00126     // what about const_iterator and const_reference?
00127     typedef RandomAccessIterator                                             iterator;
00128     typedef cusp::array1d_format                                             format;
00129     typedef typename thrust::iterator_reference<RandomAccessIterator>::type  reference;
00130     typedef typename thrust::iterator_difference<RandomAccessIterator>::type difference_type;
00131     typedef typename thrust::iterator_value<RandomAccessIterator>::type      value_type;
00132     typedef typename thrust::iterator_space<RandomAccessIterator>::type      memory_space;
00133         
00136     typedef typename cusp::array1d<value_type,memory_space> container;
00137     
00140     typedef typename cusp::array1d_view<RandomAccessIterator> view;
00141 
00142     // is this right?
00143     typedef size_t size_type;
00144     
00145     array1d_view(void)
00146       : m_begin(), m_size(0), m_capacity(0) {}
00147 
00148     template <typename Array>
00149     explicit array1d_view(Array& a)
00150       : m_begin(a.begin()), m_size(a.size()), m_capacity(a.capacity()) {}
00151     
00152     template <typename Array>
00153     explicit array1d_view(const Array& a)
00154       : m_begin(a.begin()), m_size(a.size()), m_capacity(a.capacity()) {}
00155 
00156     // should these be templated?
00157     array1d_view(RandomAccessIterator first, RandomAccessIterator last)
00158       : m_begin(first), m_size(last - first), m_capacity(last - first) {}
00159    
00160     array1d_view& operator=(const array1d_view& a)
00161     {
00162       m_begin    = a.begin();
00163       m_size     = a.size();
00164       m_capacity = a.capacity();
00165       return *this;
00166     }
00167 
00168     //template <typename Array>
00169     //array1d_view &operator=(Array &a)
00170     //{
00171     //  m_begin    = a.begin();
00172     //  m_size     = a.size();
00173     //  m_capacity = a.capacity();
00174     //  return *this;
00175     //}
00176   
00177     reference front(void) const
00178     {
00179       return m_begin[0];
00180     }
00181     
00182     reference back(void) const
00183     {
00184       return m_begin[size() - 1];
00185     }
00186 
00187     reference operator[](difference_type n) const
00188     {
00189       return m_begin[n];
00190     }
00191 
00192     iterator begin(void) const
00193     {
00194       return m_begin;
00195     }
00196 
00197     iterator end(void) const
00198     {
00199       return m_begin + m_size;
00200     }
00201 
00202     size_type size(void) const
00203     {
00204       return m_size;
00205     }
00206 
00207     size_type capacity(void) const
00208     {
00209       return m_capacity;
00210     }
00211 
00212     // TODO is there any value in supporting the two-argument form?
00213     //      i.e.  void resize(size_type new_size, value_type x = value_type())
00214     void resize(size_type new_size)
00215     {
00216       if (new_size <= m_capacity)
00217         m_size = new_size;
00218       else
00219         // XXX is not_implemented_exception the right choice?
00220         throw cusp::not_implemented_exception("array1d_view cannot resize() larger than capacity()");
00221     }
00222 
00223   protected:
00224     iterator  m_begin;
00225     size_type m_size;
00226     size_type m_capacity;
00227 };
00228 
00229 /* Convenience functions */
00230   
00231 template <typename Iterator>
00232 array1d_view<Iterator> make_array1d_view(Iterator first, Iterator last)
00233 {
00234   return array1d_view<Iterator>(first, last);
00235 }
00236 
00237 template <typename Iterator>
00238 array1d_view<Iterator> make_array1d_view(const array1d_view<Iterator>& a)
00239 {
00240   return make_array1d_view(a.begin(), a.end());
00241 }
00242 
00243 template <typename T, typename MemorySpace>
00244 typename array1d<T,MemorySpace>::view make_array1d_view(array1d<T,MemorySpace>& a)
00245 {
00246   return make_array1d_view(a.begin(), a.end());
00247 }
00248 
00249 template <typename T, typename MemorySpace>
00250 typename array1d<T,MemorySpace>::const_view make_array1d_view(const array1d<T,MemorySpace>& a)
00251 {
00252   return make_array1d_view(a.begin(), a.end());
00253 }
00257 } // end namespace cusp
